# Draft:Association of Active Neighbours (Stowarzyszenie Aktywnych SƒÖsiad√≥w SAS)

----
Association of Active Neighbours (Stowarzyszenie Aktywnych SƒÖsiad√≥w SAS) ‚Äì a non-governmental organization operating in the Micha≈Çowice commune, Mazovia region.
It was founded in 2023 by local residents concerned about the impact of rapid industrial and data-center developments in Micha≈Çowice and Regu≈Çy.
The association‚Äôs mission is to promote the sustainable development of the commune, protect the environment, ensure transparency in investment processes, and foster dialogue between residents, local authorities, and investors.
SAS carries out informational and educational activities on spatial planning, water and energy management, participates in administrative proceedings, prepares motions and opinions on local zoning plans, and initiates local civic actions and public consultations.
The organization operates on a non-profit basis, with its headquarters located in Micha≈Çowice (Micha≈Çowice commune).
